Characteristic.name: SC Control Point

InformativeText.Summary: The SC Control Point characteristic is used to request a specific function to be executed on the receiving device.

Enumeration.description: Initiate the procedure to set a cumulative value. The new value is sent as parameter following op code (parameter defined per service). The response to this control point is Op Code 16 or 0x10 in Hex followed by the Request Op Code and the appropriate Response Value
Starts the calibration of the RSC Sensor. The response to this control point is Op Code 16 or 0x10 in Hex followed by the Request Op Code and the appropriate Response Value

Update to the location of the sensor with the value sent as parameter to this op code. The response to this control point is Op Code 16 or 0x10 in Hex followed by the Request Op Code and the appropriate Response Value

Request a list of supported locations where the sensor can be attached. The response to this control point is Op Code 16 or 0x10 in Hex followed by the Request Op Code and the appropriate Response Value, including a list of supported sensor locations in the Response Parameter

Field.name: Cumulative Value
Field.InformativeText: Parameter Value for "Set Cumulative Value" Op Code

Field.name: Sensor Location Value
Field.InformativeText: Parameter Value for "Update Sensor Location" Op Code
Field.Description: Refer to the Sensor Location characteristic (org.bluetooth.characteristic.sensor_location) for additional information on the possible values for this field.

Field.name: Request Op Code
Field.InformativeText: Parameter Value for "Response Code" Op Code
Field.Description: Refer to the Op Code table above for additional information on the possible values for this field.

Field.name: Response Value
Field.InformativeText: Parameter Value for "Response Code" Op Code

Enumeration.value: Reserved For Future Use (Response Parameter: N/A)
Success (Response Parameter: None, except for Op Code 0x04, see Note below)
Op Code not supported (Response Parameter: N/A)
Enumeration.description: Response if unsupported Op Code is received
Response if Parameter received does not meet the requirements of the service
Response if the requested procedure failed

Field.name: Response Parameter
Field.InformativeText: Parameter Value for "Response Code" Op Code
Field.Description: Note: Response Parameter for Op Code 4 or 0x04 in Hex: The Parameter Value of the response to the Control Point 0x04 (Request Supported Sensor Locations) is a variable length to allow a list of different sensor locations as defined by the Service Specification.

Characteristic.Note: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
